author: The Editorial Board
title: Trump, Amazon and the Post Office
text:
President Trump on Monday continued his Twitter tantrum against Amazon, which seems to irritate him even more than CNN. He should train his fire on Congress for the post office’s problems.
Over the weekend the President tweeted that “the U.S. Post Office will lose $1.50 on average for each package it delivers for Amazon. That amounts to Billions of Dollars.” He popped off again Monday morning: “Only fools, or worse, are saying that our money losing Post Office makes money with Amazon. THEY LOSE A FORTUNE, and this will be...
